stimulusHtml: A spaceship is moving in a straight line with velocity vâ†’. The spaceship has an acceleration that is directed opposite to the direction of the velocity. Which of the following statements about the change in the kinetic energy of the spaceship is correct?
choicesHtml: The kinetic energy must be decreasing.
